alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:00PM MDT until July 12 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... North central Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 600 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Morgan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brush around 615 PM MDT. Snyder around 620 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hillrose and Midway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
